## Question Type

**What type of question is this?**

- [ ] Clarification - Need better understanding of existing content
- [ ] Application - How to apply framework to specific situation
- [ ] Methodology - Question about scoring or assessment process
- [ ] Interpretation - How to interpret results or recommendations
- [ ] Integration - How to combine with other methodologies
- [ ] Other (describe below)
